title: Why Some Companies Are Ahead in the Race to Net Zero - BCG
summary: Only 14% of companies indicated reducing emissions in line with their ambitions, down 3pp from those reporting the same in 2022.  To drive more robust emissions accounting, countries have started to implement regulations related to climate-related disclosure and reporting. Decarbonization provides a host of financial and nonfinancial rewards to businesses, with  companies that have made decarbonization progress are capturing these wide-ranging benefits and gaining a competitive edge over their peers.
green_innovation: TRUE, the article describes innovations that reduce negative environmental externalities of human activity, such as reducing or replacing harmful substances, reducing resource consumption by developing a circular economy, and the protection of biological systems.
business_innovation: TRUE, the article describes a new or improved product or business process that differs significantly from the firm's previous products or business processes, such as product-level emission assessments, digital technology solutions for emissions measurement and reduction, and  sustainability reporting regulations.
green_product: TRUE, the article describes products that are designed, manufactured, and used in a way that significantly reduces their environmental impact throughout their life cycle, such as green steel and dishwashing products that eliminate the need for prerinsing.
green_process: TRUE, the article describes a method or technique in manufacturing, production, or any other operational activity that minimizes environmental impacts and promotes sustainability, such as using renewable resources, recycling materials, employing energy-efficient technologies, and ensuring that products are biodegradable or easily recyclable at the end of their life cycle.

title: Arcade Beauty Acquires TruEssence® from ORLANDI - PR Newswire
summary: Arcade Beauty has acquired ORLANDI's TruEssence® business, including the laboratory and slurry production equipment and intellectual property. This acquisition will allow Arcade Beauty to consolidate and relocate its scented strips and label technologies operations to a new facility in Chattanooga, TN. The move is expected to enhance Arcade Beauty's ability to optimize operations and continue to deliver exceptional value to its customers.
